races.name: Irish Stallion Farms EBF Median Auction Race (Plus 10 Race)
races.verdict: This looks the perfect setting for the potentially smart Group One-entered SIR LUCAN to lay down a marker and go on to better things

nags.name: Flying Visit
nags.rp_comment: Winner's penalty will make life a little more tricky but has the form to go close

nags.name: Astrapi
nags.rp_comment: Stable hitting the frame a bit lately, half-brother to winners worth casting an eye over

nags.name: Epaulawn
nags.rp_comment: 80's on Fairyhouse debut when green at the gates and never really involved; lots to prove

nags.name: Giustino
nags.rp_comment: One of three runners for top barn, but would appear to be the lesser fancied candidate

nags.name: Hell Bent
nags.rp_comment: Mastercraftsman colt made 80,000gns as yearling, half-brother to Group-placed Hey Jonesy

nags.name: Kailash
nags.rp_comment: Nice step forward from debut run when 2nd at Curragh; third time lucky a real possibility

nags.name: Kauri Cliffs
nags.rp_comment: Did not look at that comfy around Bellewstown; form stacking up reasonably well

nags.name: Men Of Dreams
nags.rp_comment: Has only 2.75 to find with Flying Visit from a previous clash and 4lb better off here

nags.name: Prairie Dancer
nags.rp_comment: Disappointing favourite on the AW latest, previous form solid enough; should go well

nags.name: Sir Lucan
nags.rp_comment: Group Two fourth on second start; stage looks set for him to make the breakthrough

nags.name: True Artist
nags.rp_comment: Will do well to reverse recent form with Kailash; will find easier opportunities

nags.name: Pita Pinta
nags.rp_comment: Not knocked about on debut but unlikely to have made enough progress to figure here

races.name: CorkRacecourse.ie Handicap
races.verdict: Max's Dandy and GREGORY'S GIFT fought out a terrific finish at Limerick, but the latter can turn the tables on 6lb better terms

nags.name: Waterville Lady
nags.rp_comment: Hit the frame at Limerick on Saturday (3rd); could do so again here with a similar display

nags.name: Do The Twist
nags.rp_comment: Has not really gone on from a promising handicap debut run a few starts back; more needed

nags.name: Adamaris
nags.rp_comment: Might need to slide another pound or two before opening his account but not ruled out

nags.name: Kristall Eye
nags.rp_comment: Traveled well at Fairyhouse until fading late on (Adamaris 4th), back in trip here; noted

nags.name: Starting Monday
nags.rp_comment: Good fourth from a poor draw at Tipperary; out wide again here but worth a close look

nags.name: Leabaland
nags.rp_comment: A bit more required but not a great deal, and could go well if cheekpieces sharpen him up

nags.name: Gregory's Gift
nags.rp_comment: Touched off on the line by Max's Dandy at Limerick on Saturday; 6lb swing at the weights

nags.name: Whosegottheshekles
nags.rp_comment: Big price to play a part on handicap debut here when a respectable seventh; eased 4lb

nags.name: Dendrobium
nags.rp_comment: Poor in maidens, switched to handicaps here with a good draw and cheekpieces added

nags.name: Power Of Lazarus
nags.rp_comment: Killarney second on testing ground a career best; not as good at Tipperary (Gd/Y) latest

nags.name: Stellify
nags.rp_comment: Repeat of her Tipperary third could see her play a hand with Sam Ewing a notable booking

nags.name: Max's Dandy
nags.rp_comment: Slowly away but powered home to deny Gregory's Gift by a nose on Saturday; 6lb penalty

nags.name: Southwood
nags.rp_comment: Definite improvement on her recent course visit but still looks a work in progress filly

nags.name: Rizannon
nags.rp_comment: Max's Dandy the clear stable number one here on recent evidence; hard to fancy

nags.name: Angel's Trumpet
nags.rp_comment: Reserve; flopped at Tipperary; likely to be involved here if he can bounce back

nags.name: Breaking News
nags.rp_comment: Reserve; only the odd flash of ability so far but poor in three handicaps starts; risky

nags.name: Dancing Zebedee
nags.rp_comment: Reserve; respectable enough handicap debut at Navan; eased 3lb and more to come

races.name: Mallow Handicap (Div I)
races.verdict: Ask Delaney got first run on STARLIGHT Red (nap) when she was second at Tipperary and she can be fancied to turn it around here

nags.name: Juyush
nags.rp_comment: Tumbling down the handicap but still hard to fancy here on stable debut; needs better

nags.name: Swiss Army Officer
nags.rp_comment: Never at the races at Tipperary latest; previous form lines bring him back into it

nags.name: Blankiedoodie
nags.rp_comment: Gutsy winner from Adapt To Dan on Thursday; penalized 6lb, winner of three last season

nags.name: Starlight Red
nags.rp_comment: Well fancied when Ask Delaney got first run on her at Tipperary; good 2nd and a big player

nags.name: Summer's Dream
nags.rp_comment: Not ruled out on her best form but far from one to rely on and others make more appeal

nags.name: Raffaello
nags.rp_comment: Two-time winner looked to be back on song when well supported at Dundalk; claims

nags.name: Ask Delaney
nags.rp_comment: Closely matched with Starlight Red on Tipp' form; solid 4th off revised mark latest

nags.name: Adapt To Dan
nags.rp_comment: Every chance he can get his revenge on Blankiedoodie off today's revised terms; feared

nags.name: True Companion
nags.rp_comment: Huge absence to defy and entitled to need this on stable debut; probably best watched

nags.name: Kefallonia
nags.rp_comment: Punchestown third (slowly away latest) suggests he has what it takes to spring a surprise

nags.name: Uno Momento
nags.rp_comment: Flat maiden down to a career low mark, could be a dark one with 7lb claimed off his back

nags.name: Callmejango
nags.rp_comment: No shorter than 25-1 in nine starts so far and remains hard to fancy on latest evidence

nags.name: Havana Breeze
nags.rp_comment: Has her work cut out to reverse with Blankiedoodie and Adapt To Dan; 0-22 record

races.name: Mallow Handicap (Div II)
races.verdict: With SAGITTARIUS RISING looking somewhat rejuvenated on his recent outing, he is given the nod to continue the stables fine form

nags.name: Shifted Strategy
nags.rp_comment: Not without minor support when sixth at Listowel on first start for 379-days; sharper now

nags.name: New York Ballet
nags.rp_comment: Unexposed filly looked the one to take out of the race when third at Dundalk; lively one

nags.name: Sagittarius Rising
nags.rp_comment: Tipperary 3rd suggests he has found a mark off which he can be troublesome; stable flying

nags.name: Jungle Jungle
nags.rp_comment: Gowran winner not great the last twice but worth checking out with Colin Keane booked

nags.name: Eye Of The Dragon
nags.rp_comment: Good draw main positive but unplaced in nine starts and not the most obvious

nags.name: Donoch
nags.rp_comment: Unusual profile, albeit it lacking any real spice, but worth a market check on h'cap debut

nags.name: Is Fantastic
nags.rp_comment: Big run in second at Gowran, slowly away when a never nearer sixth here latest; claims

nags.name: Autumn Mist
nags.rp_comment: Killarney 5th a decent effort, questions to answer on the back of two poor subsequent runs

nags.name: Nakakande
nags.rp_comment: Surely has another win in her down to such a lowly mark but not obvious here either

nags.name: Dasheen
nags.rp_comment: Latest of three wins back in 2018 and little or nothing to show for efforts in the interim

nags.name: Kappa Kayleigh
nags.rp_comment: Not a great deal of miles on the clock but profile could do with some spicing up; outsider

nags.name: Neyland
nags.rp_comment: Close up at Dundalk; not a bad 5th here latest with both Is Fantastic & Nakakande behind

nags.name: Will She Pass
nags.rp_comment: Handicap debuant has landed the plum draw in stall one but of no real appeal on form

races.name: Fermoy Fillies Maiden
races.verdict: An open contest. PARISIENNE WAYS is one of the least exposed, her Gowran run for a stable in form was very noteworthy

nags.name: Mustmeetinbrady's
nags.rp_comment: Beaten about 15l both starts, big prices (AW); intermediate trip now

nags.name: Acuity
nags.rp_comment: Better in easy-ground maidens at Fairyhouse lately, well-beaten at 40-1; probable outsider

nags.name: Azila
nags.rp_comment: Visor off and hopes rest on her rediscovering quite smart 2yo form; yard going well

nags.name: Caca Carta
nags.rp_comment: 50s, no show on AW in January

nags.name: Harnessapower
nags.rp_comment: No heat at sales; yard in form; dam maiden (RPR 67) half-sister to Listed-placed 6f winner

nags.name: Impossible
nags.rp_comment: 40-1, showed ability at Curragh lately, but not likely here

nags.name: Lady Georgie
nags.rp_comment: Not a bad return but a long way off her mark of 85; should come on from that; yard in form

nags.name: Menagerie
nags.rp_comment: Not progressed since good-terrain Leopardstown debut; perhaps heavy not suitable last time

nags.name: Orchid Gardens
nags.rp_comment: Steps up to 1m2f but no reason to think she won't give her running, usually does; rated 83

nags.name: Parisienne Ways
nags.rp_comment: 25-1, passed nearly the entire field when second from high draw at Gowran in September

nags.name: Sharliyka
nags.rp_comment: No threat either start, though better last time; hard to fancy

nags.name: Spring Morning
nags.rp_comment: Safely held on Gowran form by Parisienne Ways when struggling at 40s; switched yards

nags.name: Starlight Dream
nags.rp_comment: Consistent and/or progressive, she went down fighting on heavy last twice over 1m4f

nags.name: Zero Turn
nags.rp_comment: Definite chance on debut offering (RPR 76) and seemed to struggle on testing ground latest

nags.name: Golden Treat
nags.rp_comment: First reserve; modest sort

nags.name: An Feileacan
nags.rp_comment: Second reserve; 100s, down the field over 7f on debut here lately

nags.name: Miss Daingerfield
nags.rp_comment: Third reserve; no threat so far

races.name: Cork Handicap
races.verdict: SATIN AND SILK, having had time to mature, could well prove the one here for Colin Keane and Ballydoyle. Noble Music merits a look

nags.name: Noble Music
nags.rp_comment: A little in and out but capable of winning off this mark if they leave her alone up front

nags.name: Ultra Pride
nags.rp_comment: Somewhat frustrating, he scored at Punchestown only to flop since; left on the same mark

nags.name: We'll Go Again
nags.rp_comment: 6lb rise less of a concern than potential for good ground, as he likes dig; this is harder

nags.name: Overheer
nags.rp_comment: Consistency rewarded with ready Tipperary win; up 9lb but more of a concern the draw

nags.name: Lady Hanson
nags.rp_comment: Maiden shaped well pretty much all runs, including here, but this is tough, as is draw

nags.name: Tashman
nags.rp_comment: Not sure he's the toughest in the world and 8lb higher since all-out Roscommon win in June

nags.name: Just Brilliant
nags.rp_comment: Well-in on form in Britain; poor both starts in Ireland; dropped 6lb; made the pace latest

nags.name: Loingseoir
nags.rp_comment: Unable to threaten off 7lb higher after C&D win in August, soft; far from disgraced latest

nags.name: Satin And Silk
nags.rp_comment: RPRS in mid-60s in maidens (good); Galileo-breds from this yard can improve exponentially

nags.name: Up With The Play
nags.rp_comment: Quite nice start to handicapping up with the pace, at Gowran; due to run at Curragh Sunday

nags.name: Dedillon
nags.rp_comment: Shade frustrating but in the money last thrice and might be again

nags.name: Dundory
nags.rp_comment: Was quite eye-catching at Gowran latest and so is rider booking; ground to suit, high draw

nags.name: Flylikeaneagle
nags.rp_comment: Minor winner for Mark Johnston (made all) last year; form tailed off completely; new yard

nags.name: Ivy Avenue
nags.rp_comment: Hat-trick bid ran aground when stepped up to 1m3f; not sure about this trip or good ground

nags.name: Magi Gal
nags.rp_comment: First reserve; struggling recent months; off 71 days

nags.name: Longoddson
nags.rp_comment: Second reserve; hard to keep sound but made nice return lately; yard in form

nags.name: Ferrum
nags.rp_comment: Third reserve; 66s, down the field on handicap debut (1m5f, soft)

races.name: Dromahane Handicap (Div I)
races.verdict: PRIME CHIEF did not see out a mile and a half here last time but this may suit

nags.name: Rockview Roman
nags.rp_comment: Not best latest but like yard, in fine form recent months and may be a bit better for that

nags.name: High Lake
nags.rp_comment: Looked a dour stayer over 2m at Thurles last week when nearly winning; cheekpieces; chance

nags.name: Du Maurier
nags.rp_comment: Better in maidens, showing nothing on recent handicap bow (1m2f, soft, 28-1)

nags.name: Tickerdi
nags.rp_comment: Pleasing AW debut in December; poor both runs in July, all over 7f; handicap debut

nags.name: Jazzelle
nags.rp_comment: Struggling past year or so; not sure why she should turn it around here; mild place claims

nags.name: Prime Chief
nags.rp_comment: Showed promise at times, notably second in AW handicap over 1m4f, and made pleasing return

nags.name: Flight Command
nags.rp_comment: Dramatic step up in trip, having showed mild promise in maidens; one to keep close eye on

nags.name: Marvel Fan
nags.rp_comment: 50s, down field over hurdles recently; maiden form only mildly encouraging; Keane rides

nags.name: Monsieur Piquer
nags.rp_comment: Struggling this year and hard to fancy but beaten 1.75l on two occasions in December on AW

nags.name: All The Mollies
nags.rp_comment: Mare knocking on the door and place chance again; has won over trip but thoroughly exposed

nags.name: Martha's Vineyard
nags.rp_comment: Latest a disaster but easily forgiven that, definite chance on previous second; new yard

nags.name: Miss Louise
nags.rp_comment: Poor performer ran well here only to flop on AW (both September); risky

nags.name: Wat Tyler
nags.rp_comment: Off for over two years; seemed modest

nags.name: Royal Red Persian
nags.rp_comment: Seems of little account; miles out of handicap

races.name: Dromahane Handicap (Div II)
races.verdict: DREAL DEAL ran into a well-treated horse and laughed at her at Limerick, with this looking another formality. Han Solo is noted

nags.name: Pulsating
nags.rp_comment: Navan winner in September tending to run well since; worth shot at trip and could place

nags.name: Beer With The Boys
nags.rp_comment: Not seen since going close final British start year ago; new yard out of form; tongue tie

nags.name: Han Solo
nags.rp_comment: Not winning out of turn over 1m here two weeks ago under this rider; place chance up 5lb

nags.name: Poster Child
nags.rp_comment: Eye-catching fourth at Navan on handicap debut post-break lately, staying on; cheekpieces

nags.name: Eala Dubh
nags.rp_comment: 150s or bigger so far, even in handicap latest, but no lost cause albeit needing more time

nags.name: Launch Her
nags.rp_comment: Pleasing debut in handicaps when seventh at Navan lately, looking like there's more there

nags.name: Dreal Deal
nags.rp_comment: Hacked up over extended 1m3f (heavy) at Limerick; looks a certainty under penalty

nags.name: Harvey Specter
nags.rp_comment: Well-exposed but tends to give his running in which case he might place

nags.name: Swiss Cottage
nags.rp_comment: Frustrating sort makes little appeal here

nags.name: Ms Thompson
nags.rp_comment: Quiet on handicap bow at Navan lately at 33s; dropped 3lb; bred to like soft

nags.name: All About Maddy
nags.rp_comment: Front-running sixth when backed into 12s on AW on return Friday; little chance

nags.name: Quiet Desire
nags.rp_comment: Well-beaten both handicaps (40-1); outsider

nags.name: Movie King
nags.rp_comment: Merely hint of ability so far including after blowing start on handicap debut lately (66s)

nags.name: Romann
nags.rp_comment: Youngster very hard to fancy here
